item.description:
Host: Claire P. cell @ 603-247-0897



How about dinner at Dimitrious Restaurant, then we go to the Pinball Wizard Arcade for a fun night playing pinball, air hockey, skeeball or video games? 

I thought it would be fun to pretend we're at the beach without traveling to the coast.  A  new place opened in Pelham and I checked it out.  The place has tons of games available for us to use, all fairly new and in good shape!

 

For a glance at Dimitrious’ menu go to the web site address below:

http://dimitriousrestaurant.com/index.php?link=dinner

 

For more information about the Pinball Wizard Arcade venue, check out their web site:

www.pinballwizardarcade.com/

 

 

I hope you will join me for a fun evening.

 

 

Please RSVP or call my cell @ 603-247-0897

 

Location: Dimitrious Restaurant  Bridge St, Pelham NH

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner @ Fun at The Pinball Wizard Arcade
